sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { ListGroup, ListGroupItem, ListGroupItemHeading, ListGroupItemText } from 'reactstrap'; const Questions = () => { return ( What do I need to play? The Lottery DApp is a decentrailised application that lives on the Ethereum Network. From your browser, please download the plugin Metamask, that will enable you to access and play our game. Metamask is an Ethereum wallet.
You will need to transfer funds to them in order to take part in the Lottery.
Where is the source code? The Lottery DApp source code can be found here Who has entered the Lottery? Everyone who has entered the Lottery can be found here How is the winner selected? The winner is selected based on a random number generated, based on the Smart Contract code. ); } export default Questions;
